verses.verse: I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> again, and looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and behold a man <S%H376><s%> with a measuring <S%H4060><s%> line <S%H2256><s%> in his hand <S%H3027><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I, Whither goest <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thou? And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, To measure <S%H4058><s%> <S%H8800><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is the breadth <S%H7341><s%> thereof, and what is the length <S%H753><s%> thereof.

And, behold, the angel <S%H4397><s%> that talked <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with me went forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and another <S%H312><s%> angel <S%H4397><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to meet <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him,

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Run <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> to this <S%H1975><s%> young man <S%H5288><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> shall be inhabited <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> as towns without walls <S%H6519><s%> for the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> and cattle <S%H929><s%> therein <S%H8432><s%>:

For I, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, will be unto her a wall <S%H2346><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and will be the glory <S%H3519><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of her.

Ho <S%H1945><s%>, ho <S%H1945><s%>, come forth, and flee <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8798><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of the north <S%H6828><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for I have spread you abroad <S%H6566><s%> <S%H8765><s%> as the four <S%H702><s%> winds <S%H7307><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.
Deliver <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8734><s%> thyself, O <S%H1945><s%> TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>, that dwellest <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> with the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%>.

For thus saith <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>; After <S%H310><s%> the glory <S%H3519><s%> hath he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me unto the nations <S%H1471><s%> which spoiled <S%H7997><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you: for he that toucheth <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8802><s%> you toucheth <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the apple <S%H892><s%> of his eye <S%H5869><s%>.

For, behold, I will shake <S%H5130><s%> <S%H8688><s%> mine hand <S%H3027><s%> upon them, and they shall be a spoil <S%H7998><s%> to their servants <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8802><s%>: and ye shall know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me.

Sing <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%>: for, lo, I come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> shall be joined <S%H3867><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%> in that day <S%H3117><s%>, and shall be my people <S%H5971><s%>: and I will dwell <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of thee, and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%> hath sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me unto thee.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> shall inherit <S%H5157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> his portion <S%H2506><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> land <S%H127><s%>, and shall choose <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> again.

Be silent <S%H2013><s%> <S%H8761><s%>, O all flesh <S%H1320><s%>, before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>: for he is raised up <S%H5782><s%> <S%H8738><s%> out of his holy <S%H6944><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>.
